title: MetroPCS Galaxy S3 AIO Root, Stock Image,+MORE -FIXED-
description:
This torrent is for the MetroPCS S3

Have you bricked your S3? The files need for ODIN are located in here.

Do you want to ROOT you phone? The files are included.

Want to put a different operating system (ROM) on to your phone to get the most out of it? The torrent includes that following:

1.) Cyanogenmod 11 Nightly
2.) Modified MetroPCS ROM Deodexed etc
3.) Baked ROM


The Modems included may help you with signal problems like dropped calls etc. But results will very. Good to try all and see which works best for you,

Before you flash ANY ROM or ROOT ANYTHING make sure to do the NVBACKUP... Oh and of course ALWAYS do nandroid back and make sure it is stored on your SD card not your internal.

PLEASE SEED!!!

I will be trying to make more of these types of torrents because these files can be hard to find and they are all that's needed to fix a bricked phone. Requests welcome!
